input.sentences: there was a race in the city .
some runners had fans supporting them .
a few people wore superhero costumes !
output.sentences: The weather is too cold for this race and too windy in this city.
The spectators cheered on the man in blue.
So many people participated including athletes in wheelchairs.
Supporting the runners, the fans yelled "Go Bopsy Go".
Lots of people wore superhero costumes to run in the race.
